column12: Title
column13: Abstract

column12: TOP-DOWN CONSTRUCTION METHOD OF BASEMENT
column13: PURPOSE: A top-down construction method of a basement is provided to prevent environmental contamination and the waste of resources caused by the new construction of a structure by constructing a basement on an existing structure. CONSTITUTION: A top-down construction method of a basement is as follows. A support unit is installed between a bearing part of an existing structure(10) and the ground(30) and supports and reinforces the existing structure. When the existing structure is supported to the ground through the support unit, a lowermost layer foundation and a floor slab of the existing structure are removed, and concrete is re-placed thereon. A space is formed by excavating the bottom of the existing structure. A basement is formed by placing concrete in the excavated portion.
column14: KOREA ENGINEERING & CONSULTANT CO LTD;;BYUN HANG YONG

column12: STRUCTURE STRENGTHENING METHOD USING THE STEEL PIPE WITH PULL-RESISTANCE MEANS
column13: A reinforcement method of an underground structure is provided to make pile indentation possible in case of the poor working condition or the difficult foundation work with equipment, and to resist buoyancy effectively in case of a structure having buoyancy. A reinforcement method of an underground structure using an indentation body having a pull-out resistant device comprises the steps of anchoring a bottom anchorage of a reaction unit(210) including a reinforcing bar in a reaction hole formed on the inner bottom of a structure constructed to the ground and applied with buoyancy to the bottom of the structure, installing a reaction supporter(200) including a top supporter(220), setting the indentation body to the indentation hole and installing an indentation device(400) between the top of the indentation body and the top supporter, and operating the indentation device and indenting the indentation body into the ground under the structure.

column12: STRUCTURE LIFTING METHOD BY FOUNDATION STRENGTHENING
column13: A structure lifting method by foundation strengthening is provided to lift a structure by employing a reaction force support body, a forcedly inserted body, and a pressing unit after forming a reinforcing foundation. A structure lifting method by foundation strengthening includes the steps of: digging the ground around a foundation of a structure(110); installing anchor bars(121) including reinforcing bars to the lateral sides of the foundation; forming a reinforcing foundation(120) by installing hollow pipes normal to the foundation, assembling the reinforcing bar to the anchor bar, assembling a lower reaction force unit(211) including a reinforcing bar around the hollow pipe, and pouring concrete to expose the top of the lower reaction force unit; installing a reaction force support body by connecting the lower end portion of an upper reaction force unit(212) to the upper end portion of the lower reaction force unit, and fixing the upper end portion of the upper reaction force unit to an upper support body; setting a forcedly inserted body(300) in an insertion hole formed by removing the hollow pipe, installing a pressing unit between the upper part of the forcedly inserted body and the upper support body to press the forcedly inserted body to the bottom of the structure; and lifting the structure by installing a lifting unit at the top of the forcedly inserted body.

column12: Repair and reinforcement system of existing structure using reaction force of pressurizing means and method thereof
column13: A system and method of repairing or reinforcing an existing structure using a reaction force of pressurizing means are provided. In a state in which structure supporting means, such as a steel pile, is pressed fit into the ground located under an existing structure to reach a predetermined rigid bearing layer, and the existing structure is lifted by the structure supporting means, a target portion for repair or reinforcement can be repaired or reinforced, irrespective of the construction site or space, without causing any harmful environmental impact.

column12: REPAIR OR REINFORCEMENT SYSTEM FOR EXISTING STRUCTURE USING REACTION FORCE OF PRESSURIZER AND REPAIR OR REINFORCEMENT METHOD FOR EXISTING STRUCTURE FOR SECURING SAFETY ON EXISTING STRUCTURE WITHOUT GIVING HARMFUL INFLUENCE TO SURROUNDING STRUCTURES
column13: PURPOSE: A repair or reinforcement method for the existing structure using a repair or reinforcement system using reaction force of a pressurizer is provided to secure the safety on the existing structure without giving harmful influence to the surrounding structures by noise and vibration controls. CONSTITUTION: The repair or reinforcement method for the existing structure using a repair or reinforcement system using reaction force of a pressurizer comprises the steps of: forming a hole on the existing foundation or a floor slab structure which is required for repair or reinforcement, inserting a reinforcement pile and installing a reinforcement pile to make the upper part in the appointed interval between the existing structure; installing a frame assembly where the upper part of the reinforcement pile is supported around the reinforcement pile; installing a pressurizer such as a hydraulic jack(400a) or a jack support(400b) to an interval between the upper part of the reinforcement pile and the existing structure, applying reaction force on the reinforcement pile by using a pressurizer to make the reinforcement pile press-fit to the ground under the existing foundation or the floor slab structure; if the reinforcement pile press-fits to the appointed depth to support the foundation or the floor slab of the existing structure, and forming the reinforcement pile and the existing foundation or the floor slab structure of the existing structure in one, wherein the frame assembly is used as a pressurizing support of the pressurizer.

column12: REPAIR AND REINFORCEMENT SYSTEM OF EXISTING STRUCTURE USING REACTION FORCE OF PRESSURIZING MEANS AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: A system and method of repairing or reinforcing an existing structure using a reaction force of pressurizing means are provided. In a state in which structure supporting means, such as a steel pile, is pressed fit into the ground located under an existing structure to reach a predetermined rigid bearing layer, and the existing structure is lifted by the structure supporting means, a target portion for repair or reinforcement can be repaired or reinforced, irrespective of the construction site or space, without causing any harmful environmental impact.

column12: BOGIE FOR REINFORCING UNDERGROUND STRUCTURE
column13: A bogie for reinforcing the ground is provided to set hydraulic cylinders to a desired place in a limited space by moving the hydraulic cylinders vertically and horizontally with worker's feet and hands. A bogie for reinforcing the ground comprises a trolley, a vertical movement unit(200), a horizontal movement unit(300), a vertically moving lift(400), a horizontally moving lift(500). The trolley includes front, rear, and vertical frames(110,120,130). Both front and rear frames are provided with wheels(113,122). The vertical frame is mounted on the front frame. The vertical movement unit slide on the vertical frame vertically. The horizontal movement unit is installed in the front of the vertical movement unit to support a pressing unit(600) and an elevating unit. The horizontal movement unit moves back and forth. The vertically moving lift, which is installed to the trolley at the back of the horizontal movement unit, includes a hydraulic jack lifting a chain meshed with the vertical movement unit. The horizontally moving lift is a hydraulic jack, which is supported by the vertical movement unit, and connected to the horizontal movement unit. The horizontally moving lift slides the horizontal movement unit back and forth with regard to the vertical movement unit.

column12: A MIXED EXPANSION JOINT STRUCTURE
APPARATUS FOR PRESSING OF PILE AND THE METHOD FOR REINFORCING OF BACE USING THEREOF
column13: PURPOSE: An apparatus for pressing steel piles and a method for reinforcing foundations using the same are provided to prevent a driving cylinder from becoming conducted by installing the driving cylinder in a frame. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for pressing steel pipes comprises a frame(10) and a driving cylinder(20). The frame is mounted to a bottom plate(110), and vertically extended. The driving cylinder is vertically installed in the frame. A piston rod(22) vertically moves, and presses the steel piles(P) on the ground.
column14: KOREA ENGINEERING & CONSULTANT CO LTD;;BYUN HANG YONG

column12: Repair and reinforcement system of existing structure using reaction force of pressurizing means and method thereof
A BRIDGE LIFTING SYSTEM AND BRIDGE LIFTING METHOD USING THE SAME
STRUCTURE CONSECUTIVE LIFTING APPARATUS AND LIFTING METHOD USING THAT
column13: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for continuous lifting of a structure are provided to continuously raise a settled structure up to the desired height. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for continuous lifting of a structure comprises an insert member(110), a support member(120), a reactive force supporting part(130), an inserting and lifting unit(140), and a position-fixing unit(150). The insert member is installed in an installation hole to be extended toward the ground. The support member is fixed on a structure on an end and extended upward. The reactive force supporting part is fixed to the top of the support. The inserting and lifting unit is installed between the insert and the reactive force supporting part to insert the insert member to a support layer and raise the structure. The position-fixing unit fixes the raised position of the support member with respect to the insert member in order to prevent the descent of the raised structure.
column14: KOREA ENGINEERING & CONSULTANT CO LTD;;BYUN HANG YONG

column12: THE GROUND REINFORCEMENT METHOD
column13: PURPOSE: A ground reinforcement method is provided to reduce the collapse risk of a slope surface by gradually and alternately reinforcing the ground. CONSTITUTION: A ground reinforcement method comprises the following steps: cutting the ground for a predetermined depth and inserting an anchor structural body(100) to a slope surface(11); inserting a pressurization plate to one end of the anchor structural body; fastening a fastening member to the anchor structural body to closely attach the pressurization plate to the slope surface; injecting concrete mortar(20) between the anchor structural body and the ground and grouting; and gradually and alternately performing the above steps to reach a reference depth.
column14: KOREA ENGINEERING & CONSULTANT CO LTD;;BYUN HANG YONG

column12: SYSTEM FOR EASILY DRIVING PILE FOR REINFORCING STRUCTURE INTO GROUND REGARDLESS OF CONDITION OF GROUND OR SPOT
column13: PURPOSE: A system for driving a pile is provided to reinforce and support the structure by directly transmitting heavy load of the structure into the ground, and to install the piles easily by transmitting driving force of the hydraulic unit with the tendon. CONSTITUTION: A pile driving system for supporting and reinforcing a structure(10) is composed of a reaction force supporting body(340) spaced from the lower part of the structure, a pile(310) press-fitted to lower grounds(100,200) of the reaction force supporting body and composed of a hydraulic unit(350) in the upper part, and a tendon(330) inclined and connected to the reaction force supporting body and the lower part of the structure or the fixture around the lower part of the structure. Action force is applied to the reaction force supporting body in actuating the hydraulic unit, and the pile is press-fitted to the ground by using reaction force in restricting movement of the reaction force supporting body by the tendon. The reaction force supporting body and the tendon are disassembled, and a supporting reinforcing unit is installed. The supporting reinforcing unit is composed of a supporting member arranged between the upper part of the pile and the lower part of the structure, and an elastic body integrally fixed to the upper part of the supporting member and contacted to the lower part of the structure.

column12: Repair and reinforcement system of existing structure using reaction force of pressurizing means and method thereof
column13: A system and method of repairing or reinforcing an existing structure using a reaction force of pressurizing means are provided. In a state in which structure supporting means, such as a steel pile, is pressed fit into the ground located under an existing structure to reach a predetermined rigid bearing layer, and the existing structure is lifted by the structure supporting means, a target portion for repair or reinforcement can be repaired or reinforced, irrespective of the construction site or space, without causing any harmful environmental impact.

column12: CONSTRUCTION METHOD OF CELLAR FOR BUILDING COMPLETED
column13: PURPOSE: A cellar construction method for a building is provided to simply and safely construct a cellar in a building using a press-in machine for driving piles. CONSTITUTION: A cellar construction method for a building is as follows. A plurality of slots are formed on the bottom concrete(2) of a building(1). Supports are inserted in the slots so that stoppers protruding from the bottom of the supports are fixed. A press-in machine is installed on the top of the supports. Hollow piles(7a) are inserted in the slots respectively and pressed into the ground by the press-in machine. Other piles are stacked on the top of the piles and successively pressed to form posts(7) for supporting the building. The ground under the bottom concrete is excavated to secure an underground space. Concrete is placed on the horizontal and vertical faces of the underground space.
column14: KOREA ENGINEERING & CONSULTANT CO LTD;;BYUN HANG YONG;;UNIVERSE TOP ENGINEERING ARCHITECT OFFICE CO

column12: SHEAR STRENGTHENING AND SEISMIC PERFORMANCE IMPROVEMENT OF STRUCTURES USING GAC WIRE ROPE
column13: A shear and earthquake proof reinforcing structure using shear reinforcing wire ropes is provided to adjust cut length of the shear reinforcing wire ropes simply and install shear reinforcing bars easily by a joint device and a spacer. A shear and earthquake proof reinforcing structure comprises shear reinforcing wire ropes(100), wire rope coupling devices(200), and a spacer. The shear reinforcing wire ropes are placed to cover main reinforcing bars(300) including upper and lower reinforcing bars. The wire rope coupling devices include eye bolts(210,220) mounted to two ends of the shear reinforcing wire ropes, and a jointing device(230) including a turn buckle. The spacer is installed between the main reinforcing bars to maintain the distance between the main reinforcing bars, and mounted with the turn buckle to adjust the extended length.
column14: KOREA ENGINEERING & CONSULTANT;;BYUN HANG YONG;;KIM SUN YOUNG;;BYUN SU MIN
column15: BYUN HANG YONG;;KIM SUN YOUNG;;BYUN SU MIN

column12: JACKING METHOD FOR PILE
column13: PURPOSE: A loading test method of a precast pile and a reinforcement method of the precast pile using the same are provided to prevent inclination of the building and ground subsidence by testing a load of an existing structure and to improve stability of a building design by improving supporting force of the precast pile. CONSTITUTION: A loading test method of a precast pile(200) and a reinforcement method of the precast pile using the same comprise the following steps. A foundation concrete layer(100) around an upper part of the precast pile is removed. An anchor member is installed in the foundation concrete layer around an end part of an exposed precast pile. A pressure application unit pressurizing the pile is installed in the anchor member. A loading test is carried out by adding an external force with the pressure application unit to a direction in which the pile is stuck. The precast pile is stuck in order to improve the supporting force of a building when the supporting force is less than a predetermined value, or the tip end bearing of the pile does not implemented through the loading test.

column12: A GRINDING WORK DEVICE
column13: A grinding work device is provided to improve productivity by automatically executing supply, grinding, and discharge work of workpieces. A grinding work device comprises a main table(100); a hopper(110) installed to the main table to supply a workpiece(101); a gripping unit gripping the workpiece supplied from the hopper; a grinding stone(130) installed to the main table to grind the workpiece gripped; and a discharge unit discharging the workpiece grounded.

column12: INCLINE PILE PRESSING APPARATUS AND INCLINE PILE PRESSING METHOD USING THAT
column13: PURPOSE: A device for constructing a slope pile and a method using the same for constructing the slope pile are provided to reduce the construction costs and to rapidly construct the slope pile as a limited space is minimized. CONSTITUTION: A device(100) for constructing a slope pile comprises a guide pipe(120), a hydraulic jack(140), and a supporter. The guide pipe is installed to be vertically inclined, thereby guiding a direction where a pile(20) is press-constructed. The hydraulic jack pressurizes the pile from the top to the bottom. The supporter is fixed on a side wall in order to have an inclined surface, thereby supporting the hydraulic jack.

column12: STRUCTURE LIFTING AND FOUNDATION REINFORCING METHOD USING STEEL PIPE
column13: Provided is a structure lifting and foundation reinforcing method using a press-in member, capable of arbitrarily constructing a reaction force supporting member, a press-in member, a press-in means inside a structure having a closed and limited space under the ground such as a drainage culvert disposed at a bank, and lifting a structure that subsides. Accordingly, the reaction force supporting member is constructed at a lower plate of the structure, the press-in member is pressed in a lower portion of the structure by using the reaction force supporting member, a lifting means is provided to an upper portion of the press-in member to lift the final structure, and the pressed press-in member is integrated with a fixed reaction force bar and the structure so as to function as a foundation pile of the lifted structure.
column14: KOREA ENGINEERING & CONSULTANT;;BYUN HANG YONG;;KIM SUN YOUNG

column12: WORKPIECE SUPPORTING APPARATUS
ANCHOR ASSEMBLY DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to an anchor assembly and an anchor assembly forming method to support a hydraulic jack when the hydraulic jack is lifting structures or piles are being constructed. The anchor assembly according to the present invention is for a pile construction device which comprises a reaction body supported in a supporting surface and extended to the top; a fixing plate fixed to the top of the reaction body; and the hydraulic jack supported in the fixing plate to indent piles to the bottom. The anchor assembly comprises an extension rod which is extended to the bottom through the supporting surface to be adjacent to the pile insertion hole of the supporting surface to be inserted with a reinforcing pile and is connected to the reaction body; an anchor member which is installed at the bottom of the extension rod and is protruding from the extension rod in the radial direction to form a catching protrusion to prevent the extension rod from coming out to the top of the supporting surface; and a fixing part to fix the extension rod to the supporting surface. The anchor assembly and the anchor assembly forming method according to the present invention facilitate the formation of the anchor member to support the hydraulic jack.

column12: TENSION CONTROL BRACKET
column13: PURPOSE: A tensile force controlling bracket is provided to control tensile stress to apply the tensile stress, which is suitable for fixing a structure, to a tensile member when the tensile member lengthens by moving a body in which the tensile member is installed to front and to rear from the structure. CONSTITUTION: A tensile force control bracket(10) comprises a body(20), a clamping unit(30), and a transferring member(40). The body includes a coupling unit, a screw unit and a hollow in order to insert a tensile member(11) installed in the structure. A hollow suppresses the clamping unit with the tensile stress applied to the tensile member and includes a fixing force. The clamping unit is installed on an end of the tensile member and fixes the tensile member to the body. The transferring member moves the body to the front and to the rear according to an applied direction of the tensile stress in order to control the tensile stress.

column12: DISPLAY APPARATUS
column13: According to an embodiment of the present invention, a display apparatus comprises a display panel including a plurality of pixels including a light emitting element and a pixel circuit. The plurality of pixels include a plurality of sub-pixels emitting light of different colors, each of the plurality of subpixels is operated by being divided into first to third periods according to at least one of a first scan signal, a second scan signal, and an EM signal, the second scan signal is a gate-on voltage during the first period, the first scan signal and the second scan signal are the gate-on voltage during the second period, and the EM signal is the gate-on voltage during the third period. The light emitting element emits light, and the pixel circuit is operated by being divided into a plurality of bands with different highest target luminances, and the duty ratio of the EM signal can be driven differently so that the third period is variable in at least one of the plurality of bands. Accordingly, since a light emission period longer than the minimum period, during which color change is recognized, is ensured, color change can be minimized even if the duty ratio of the EM signal is varied, thereby increasing image quality.

column12: Construction method of cellar for building completed
column13: Disclosed is a construction method of a cellar for a building completed. The construction method includes fixing supporting structures to bottom concrete of the building; installing a press-in machine on the supporting structures; inserting posts for supporting the building into the foundation under the building by inserting hollow piles into the holes to then insert the piles into the underground using the press-in machine, stacking new piles on the inserted piles, and sequentially inserting the piles using the press-in machine; excavating a foundation under the bottom concrete of the building to prepare an underground space when the building is supported by the posts; and placing the concrete on the horizontal and vertical faces of the underground space prepared by the excavating the bottom concrete of the building.
column14: KOREA ENGINEERING & CONSULTANT CO LTD;;BYUN HANG RYONG;;KIM JUN SEOUNG

column12: CONSTRUCTION METHOD OF CELLAR FOR BUILDING COMPLETED
column13: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a construction method of a cellar for a building completed.SOLUTION: The construction method includes: a step of making a plurality of holes and a slot pass through bottom concrete at the bottom part of the building completed so as to be communicated with the holes, inserting a support to the inside of the slot and making a stopper projected at the lower part of the support be engaged with the lower part of the slot to fix it; a step of providing a press-in machine on the upper part of the support; a step of inserting hollow piles to the respective holes, then pushing the piles into the underground using the press-in machine, stacking other piles on the pushed-in piles every time the piles are pushed in, then successively pushing them in by the press-in machine to support the underground structure of the building completed; a step of supporting the building completed by a column pushed into the underground and excavating the lower ground of the bottom concrete of the building in order to secure an underground space; and a step of placing concrete to the horizontal surface and vertical surface of the underground space secured by the step of excavating the lower ground of the concrete.
column14: KOREA ENGINEERING & CONSULTANT CO LTD;;BYUN HANG RYONG;;KIM JUN SON

column12: CONSTRUCTION METHOD OF CELLAR FOR BUILDING COMPLETED

The construction method includes fixing supporting structures to bottom concrete of the building; installing a press-in machine on the supporting structures; inserting posts for supporting the building into the foundation under the building by inserting hollow piles into the holes to then insert the piles into the underground using the press-in machine, stacking new piles on the inserted piles, and sequentially inserting the piles using the press-in machine; excavating a foundation under the bottom concrete of the building to prepare an underground space when the building is supported by the posts; and placing the concrete on the horizontal and vertical faces of the underground space prepared by the excavating the bottom concrete of the building.

column12: LIQUID CRYSTAL DISPLAY DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to a liquid crystal display device, and more particularly, to a liquid crystal display which has an effective heat radiation design by connecting a connecting member to a printed circuit board in a flat type structure. According to features of the present invention, there is provided a protrusion end at one edge of a cover bottom corresponding to one edge to which a printed circuit board of a liquid crystal panel, wherein the protrusion end supports a rear surface of a connecting member which connects the liquid crystal panel to the printed circuit board in a flat type, so that heat having a high temperature and generated from a driving circuit mounted on the connecting member may be radiated rapidly and effectively to an outside. Thus, the durability of the driving circuit may be prevented from being deteriorated so that the reliability of the driving circuit is improved and the picture quality of the liquid crystal display device is prevented from being deteriorated.

column12: STRUCTURE LIFTING AND FOUNDATION STRENGTHENING METHOD USING THE STEEL PIPE

column12: THE ANCHOR STRUCTURE WHICH HAS ROUND ROOT AND THE FOUNDATION STRUCTURE CONSTRUCTION METHOD WHICH USE THIS
column13: PURPOSE: An anchor structure for raising a structure and a method for manufacturing the same are provided to stably raising the subsided structure by forming an anchor supporting unit. CONSTITUTION: An anchor structure(40) for raising a structure comprises an anchor member(41), bulb units(42), and an anchor supporting unit(43). One end of the anchor member is inserted into an expansion hole(12) extended from a through-hole arranged in a base foundation. The bulb unit is formed into a ring-shaped spiral structure in an end of the anchor. A plurality of the bulb units is arranged in the expansion hole to be crossed. The anchor supporting unit surrounds the bulb units with concrete mortar charged in the expansion hole.

column12: Method of static load test of existing pile
column13: The present invention relates to a static load test method for a pre-installed pile installed under an existing structure. The static load test method of the existing pile comprises the following steps of: a) excavating the ground under a base plate (11) of the structure (10); b) cutting the pre-installed pile to separate the same into an upper pile (21) and a lower pile (22); and c) performing a static load test for the lower pile (22). The static load test method measures support force of the pre-installed pile without damage on the base plate.
column14: KIM JUN SEOUNG;;BYUN SU MIN;;BYUN HANG YONG;;LEE KUEN WOO;;KOREA ENG & CONSULTANT CO LTD
column15: KIM JUN SEOUNG;;BYUN SU MIN;;BYUN HANG YONG;;LEE KUEN WOO

column12: DISPLAY DEVICE
column13: 본 발명의 표시 장치는 제1 공통 전압보다 크거나 작은 펄스를 갖는 제2 공통 전압을 수직 동기 신호의 블랭크 구간에 표시 패널로 인가시켜 액정들이 스윙되어 정위치로 조정되도록 하여 줌으로써, 각 화소 영역에 남아 있는 DC 성분으로 인한 화질 차이에 의한 화질 불량을 방지하여 줄 수 있다.

column12: STIFFENER FOR REPAIR OF CONCRETE STRUCTURE AND REPAIRING AND REINFORCING METHOD OF CONCRETE STRUCTURE, MAKING USE OF STIFFENER
column13: PURPOSE: A stiffener for repair of a concrete structure and a repairing and reinforcing method of the concrete structure, masking use of the stiffener are provided to raise constructability, minimize breakage of the structure, and easily and exactly secure stressing force set through the fastening of bolts and nuts and through measurement of torque. CONSTITUTION: A stiffener for repair of a concrete structure(C) comprises a pair of angle-type supports(10) having horizontal plate parts and vertical plate parts; plural anchor bolts(20) fastened to anchor-through holes of the horizontal plate parts and fixed to the concrete structure to be repaired; plural linear tendons(30) arranged in parallel; and plural nuts(40) disposed outside the vertical plate parts and screwed to male screw parts(31) disposed to the ends of the linear tendons, to give stressing force by pulling the linear tendons to both sides. The anchor bolts fix the angle-type supports to the surface of the concrete structure. The male screw parts are fitted into screw-through holes of the angle-type supports.
column14: KOREA ENGINEERING & CONSULTANT;;M & S INDUSTRY CO LTD
column15: CHOI BOO WHAN;;BYUN HANG YONG;;YOON JU HYON

column12: System for registering and authenticating human face using support vector machines and method thereof
column13: A system for performing face registration and authentication using face information, and a method thereof. A set of readily distinguishable features for each user is selected at a registration step and only the set of features selected at the registration step is used at a face authentication step, whereby memory use according to unnecessary information and amount of data calculation for face authentication can be reduced. Thus, the present system has an advantage in that identity authentication through face authentication can be performed even under restricted environments of a USB token or smart card with limited resources. The present system further has advantages in that authentication performance is improved, as readily distinguishable feature information is used, and the time for face authentication is reduced, as face authentication is performed using the SVM built by using the optimal set of readily distinguishable features at a training step.
column14: LEE KYUNGHEE;;CHUNG YONGWHA;;PARK CHEE HANG;;BYUN HYERAN

column12: Upward basement structure demolition method
column13: 본 발명은, 지하층 구조물(100)을 철거하는 철거공법에 있어서, 가) 지하층 구조물(100)의 기초판(50)에 잭파일(200)을 설치하고, 파일(210)을 지지층까지 설치하는 단계; 나) 지하층 구조물(100) 일부를 절단하여 장비반입, 철거물 제거 및 되메우기 토사를 공급하기 위한 공간을 확보하는 단계; 다) 잭파일(200)을 이용하여 지하층 구조물(100)을 일정 높이 상승시키는 단계; 라) 상승에 의해 그라운드레벨(G.L) 이상으로 노출된 지하층 구조물(100) 철거 및 기초판(50) 하부를 토사로 되메우기하는 단계; 마) 상기 잭파일(200)을 제거하고, 상기 기초판(50)을 철거하는 단계를 포함하는 상승식 지하층 구조물 철거공법에 관한 것이다.
column15: BYUN HANG YONG;;KIM EUN YOUNG;;CHO YANG HYUN

column12: PARTITION FOR CLEANROOM
column13: PURPOSE: An air current partition for a clean room is provided to prevent a clean room from being polluted and streamline manufacturing and assembling processes, since an aluminum cover and a bolt are not used. CONSTITUTION: An air current partition for a clean room comprises a profile(110), a mold(200), and an acryl plate(300). The profile is formed of an angular cross-section structure and is assembled in a lattice type. The profile has a fixing groove(120) and a cutting space(130). The fixing groove has an inlet(122) that is narrower than an inner space and a reinforcement projection(126). The mold has multiple protrusions(210a,210b) and an acryl plate insertion groove(220). The protrusions are flexibly press-fitted into the fixing groove of the profile. The acryl plate insertion groove is concavely formed in the opposite direction to the projection direction of the protrusion.

column12: LONGITUDINAL AND/OR TRANSVERSE SEISMIC REINFORCING METHOD FOR MASONRY WALLS
column13: PURPOSE: A bidirectional/unidirectional earthquake resistant reinforcement method for a masonry wall is provided to improve the internal force and earthquake-resistance of a masonry wall without using metal reinforcements or attached reinforcements. CONSTITUTION: A bidirectional/unidirectional earthquake resistant reinforcement method for a masonry wall is as follows. Lower fixtures(400:400a,400b,400c) are set on a bottom slab(S1) around a masonry wall(100) in the traverse direction of the masonry wall. Upper fixtures(500) are set on a side of an upper beam(B2) around the masonry wall surrounding in the traverse direction of the masonry wall Wire ropes(300) are set on the upper and lower fixtures in the longitudinal direction using eye bolts(200). The masonry wall is restricted by the upper and lower fixtures.

column12: STRUCTURE REINFORCING SYSTEM AND THE METHOD USING REINFORCING MEMBER AND WIREROPE
column13: A structure reinforcing system and method, using a load carrying capacity reinforcing material and a wire rope are provided to increase the external force resistance capacity and to minimize the coating thickness of the wire rope. A structure reinforcing system includes a load carrying capacity reinforcing material extended to the longitudinal direction at the surface of a reinforced structure to contain a plate-shaped member(220); and a wire rope(400) fixed by the direct friction force at the surface of the load carrying capacity reinforcing material, whose both ends are mutually fixed by an end constraint device(300) containing an eyebolt and an eyebolt connection device(320) to constraint the reinforced structure. The end restraint device contains the eye bolt having a head unit(311) and a bolt unit(312) formed with a penetration hole(321) where the end is constrained, and the eyebolt connection device by which one penetration hole is inserted at the bolt unit and constrained by a nut, wherein the other end of the wire rope is penetrated at another penetration hole(322) and overlapped like U to be constrained. Both ends of the wire rope are constrained by a pressure member(600) covering/pressing overlapped parts(A,B).

column12: Devices and methods for updating program code via a serial ata interface
column13: An apparatus and method update a program code of an electronic device, such as an optical disk drive, using a Serial Advanced Technology Attachment (SATA) interface. The apparatus receives SATA signals from the SATA interface and generates flash memory driving signals based on a register host-to-device FIS received from a host computer system. Furthermore, the apparatus receives program data from a data host-to-device FIS received from the host computer system and updates the program code of a flash memory in the electronic device.

column12: SHEAR STRENGTH REINFORCING SYSTEM FOR STRUCTURE USING EYE BOLT AND WIRE ROPE
column13: Provided is a structure shear reinforcing system for shear reinforcement of a concrete structure such as a beam. Wire ropes constrained by eyebolts are disposed to surround a reinforced structure in a shear reinforcement direction (longitudinal or transverse direction) and are fixed to fixing members mounted to a side surface of the structure or a slab, and the wire rope are constrained by pressure welding members so as not to be released from the eyebolts, so that the wire ropes can be tightened to surround the structure in the shear reinforcement direction. Therefore, the effective and economic shear reinforcement of the structure is possible.

column12: METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING CARBON DIOXIDE BY PRESSURE SWING ABSORPTION
column13: 본 발명은 CO를 선택적으로 흡착하는 흡착제를 충전한 흡착탑을 압력변동흡착법으로 운전하여 CO를 포함한 혼합가스로부터 고순도 CO를 분리, 회수하는 방법에 있어서, 기존의 공정은 승압스텝-흡착스텝-세정스텝-탈착스텝으로 이루어지는데 낮은 압력에서 CO의 흡착량이 큰 경우에는 탈착스텝이 끝난 뒤에도 흡착제에 잔류하는 CO의 양이 많으므로 이를 회수하여 공정의 효율을 높이기 위한 방법에 관한 것으로서, 상기 공정구성에다가 탈착스텝이 끝난 흡착탑으로 다른 탑의 흡착스텝에서 배출되는 CO농도가 낮은 배가스를 향류로 도입하여 탈착시스템이 끝난 흡착탑에 잔존하는 CO를 치환 탈착시키는 흡착배가스 저압세정스텝과 흡착배가스 저압세정스텝에서 배출되는 CO농도 높은 배가스를 흡착스텝이 끝난 다른 탑으로 공급하여 CO를 흡착시키는 저압세정배가스 흡착스텝을 도입하였고, 또 흡착배가스 저압, 세정스텝이 끝난 탑으로 CO농도가 낮은 흡착스텝의 배가스를 향류로 도입하여 CO의 흡착전선을 흡착탑 입구쪽으로 보내는 흡착배가스 역축압스텝을 추가하여 흡착 배가스 역축압스텝 이후에 진행되는 흡착스텝에서 배출되는 배가스 중의 CO농도를 낮추었다. 이렇게 함으로써 고순도의 CO제품가스를 높은 회수율로 생산할 수 있었으며, 본 발명에서 고안된 공정구성은 하나의 흡착탑을 기준으로 하여 보면 순차적으로 흡착배가스 역축압스텝-승압스텝-흡착스텝-저압세정배가스 흡착스텝-세정스텝-탈착스텝-흡착배가스 저압세정스텝으로 이루어진다.

column12: .. / A SYSTEM FOR REGISTERING AND AUTHENTICATING HUMAN FACE USING SUPPORT VECTOR MACHINES AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: PURPOSE: A system and a method for registering and certifying a face using an SVM(Support Vector Machine) are provided to realize the identification through the face certification in a limited resource environment such as a USB(Universal Serial Bus) token or a smart card by reducing the memory use due to the unnecessary information and a data computing volume for the face certification. CONSTITUTION: An image input part(105) inputs a face image of the users registered to a certification system. A face and eye region extracting part(106) extracts the face and eye region for the image inputted from the image input part(105). A controller(110) divides the face image into a learning image and a tuning image, and generates a characteristic information set in the face image representing each gene for the learning and the tuning image. An SVM classifier(108) judges the face certification by comparing a characteristic vector, which is the most suitable characteristic set repeatedly measuring the suitableness through a characteristic set selection process using a gene algorithm, with the characteristic vector selected from the face image of other user.
column15: BYUN HYE RAN;;JUNG YONG HWA;;LEE GYEONG HUI;;PARK CHI HANG

column12: FOOT MASSAGER
column13: PURPOSE: A foot massager is provided to massage the foot of a lying patient or a surgical patient to increase the blood flow by selecting and applying an appropriate pressure to the foot and to increase the treatment effects through thermo therapy and acupressure. CONSTITUTION: The foot massager, in which a vibrator of a pair of solenoids(2,2') vibrates acupressure rods(21,21') and massages the foot, includes a case(1) which stands upright and is separated into a front body(11) and a back body(11'); the front body(11) of the case(1) which has a pair of acupressure parts(12,12') with bores(111,111") in the middle through which a pair of acupressure rods(21,21') of solenoid(2,2') run, and an indicating part(13) to which an indicator(4) showing the operation mode is attached; the back body(11') of the case(1) which has a main board(3) for controlling the solenoid(2,2') operation and the vibration-proof unit(5) to support a pair of solenoids(2,2') as the acupressure parts(12,12') are directly connected; and the bottom of the front body(11) of the case(1) which has the bed(15) for holding the heel, and fixtures(6a,6b) for clinging the sole to the acupressure parts(12,12') and a belt(7).

column12: RADAR PERFORMANCE EVALUATION SYSTEM AND RADAR PERFORMANCE EVALUATION METHOD
column13: A radar performance evaluation system and a radar performance evaluation method for evaluating radar performance are disclosed. The radar performance evaluation system according to one embodiment comprises: a processor that models an array antenna and mounting structure of a radar, simulates mounting performance of the mounting structure based on the modeled array antenna and mounting structure, analyzes an amplitude and phase of antenna reception current for each signal direction based on the simulation, determines distortion of reception performance based on the analyzed amplitude and phase, derives a radiation pattern of the array antenna, determines distortion of the radiation pattern based on the derived radiation pattern, and generates antenna relocation information for relocating the array antenna based on the distortion of reception performance and distortion of the radiation pattern; and a storage unit that stores the amplitude and phase of antenna reception current, the derived radiation pattern and the antenna relocation information. The radar performance evaluation system evaluates radar performance based on complex reception current applied to the array antenna of the radar.

column12: HIGH STRENGTH COLD ROLLED STEEL SHEET HAVING EXCELLENT BURRING PROPERTY AND MANUFACTRING METHOD FOR THE SAME
column13: The present invention relates to a high strength cold rolled steel sheet having excellent burring properties and a manufacturing method thereof. According to one aspect of the present invention, the high strength cold rolled steel sheet comprises 15-60% of ferrite, 10-35% of martensite, and 5-20% of the remaining austenite with respect to an area fraction. An area ratio of the ferrite phase having the length less than or equal to 5 μm of the entire ferrite phase (Area of ferrite phase having the length less than or equal to 5 μm/Area of the entire ferrite phase x 100) can be greater than or equal to 70%.

column12: MOBILE TERMINAL AND CONTROL METHOD FOR THE MOBILE TERMINAL
column13: The present invention relates to a mobile terminal and a control method thereof capable of controlling a function of the mobile terminal in response to an external force. The mobile terminal according to an embodiment of the present invention includes a terminal body; an acceleration sensor which senses a tap of hitting an object by using the movement of the terminal body and generates a control signal when the tap is sensed multiple times within a time limit; and a control unit which controls at least one of executable functions on the terminal in response to the control signal.

column12: MOBILE TERMINAL AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE SAME
column13: The present invention relates to a mobile terminal, detecting a conductive object and performing a different control relating to an external terminal according to a pattern of the detected conductive object, and a control method thereof. According to the present invention, the mobile terminal comprises: a wireless communication unit transmitting/receiving data to/from other terminals; a touch screen configured to detect a conductive object; and a control unit recognizing a pattern formed by a region in which the conductive object is detected when the conductive object is detected through the touch screen, and performing control relating to the external terminal corresponding to the recognized pattern. The relating control includes transmitting a control command relating to the external terminal to the external terminal. According to the present invention, since a user touches the touch screen with one surface of the external terminal or object, the mobile terminal can be paired with the external terminal, and a preset function can be executed in the mobile terminal and the external terminal.

column13: 본 발명은, 네 개의 기둥들을 연결하는 가로 보들과, 상기 기둥들 및 상기 가로 보들을 연결하는 세로 보들을 형성하기 위해 상기 기둥들 사이에 배치되는 패널 조립체들의 배치 구조에 관한 것으로, 상기 패널 조립체들의 배치 구조는, 상기 각 패널 조립체들은, 일정한 길이를 갖는 제1 패널들 및 상기 제1 패널들의 일측 단부에 길이가 상대적으로 짧은 제2 패널로 이루어지는 패널들을 포함하고, 상기 가로 보들이 형성될 위치에는 각각 한 쌍의 패널 조립체들이 상기 제2 패널이 서로 마주 보도록 일렬로 배치되고, 상기 세로 보들이 형성될 위치에는 각각 한 쌍의 패널 조립체들이 상기 제2 패널이 서로 반대쪽을 향하도록 일렬로 배치될 수 있다.

column12: OFFSHORE DRILLING STRUCTURE AND DRILLING METHOD THEREOF
column13: The present invention relates to an offshore drilling structure and, more specifically, to an offshore drilling structure which separates carbon dioxide discharged from an oil well and uses the carbon dioxide as a power source of pneumatic drilling equipment or a generation device for emergency. The offshore drilling structure for performing a drilling work, according to the present invention, comprises: a separator which separates carbon dioxide from gas discharged from an oil well; a storage unit which stores the carbon dioxide separated in the separator; and a unit which consumes the carbon dioxide supplied from the storage unit.

column12: EMERGENCY COOLING APPARATUS FOR MARINE NUCLEAR REACTOR BASED ON ESS
column13: The present invention relates to an apparatus for cooling a marine nuclear reactor (10) based on an ESS, comprising: an auxiliary power generation means (20) vaporizing a heat medium using waste heat of a marine nuclear reactor (10) and enabling the heat medium to circulate by a turbine (22) and a compressor (24) to generate power; and a cooling means (30) operating a coolant pump (31) with the vaporized heat medium to enable a coolant on the nuclear reactor (10) to circulate. Therefore, the present invention uses the waste heat generated by an offshore floating type nuclear power plant in order to improve overall energy efficiency and build an additional emergency power generation system to be capable of securing a safer nuclear facility.

column12: ARSNTD A MANUFACTURING METHOD FOR SOLUBLE AND ACTIVE RECOMBINANT PROTEIN USING Aminoacyl tRNA synthetase N-terminal domain AS FUSION PARTNER AND A PRODUCT THEREOF
column13: The present invention relates to a method for efficiently producing water-soluble genetic recombinant protein in Escherichia coli by using a fusion protein expression technology which is a protein folding inducing technology. More specifically, the present invention relates to development of a preventive vaccine for effectively preventing infection by fusing an HA1 portion, including immune specificity, in a hemagglutinin (HA) antibody which is pathogen protein of influenza, and aminoacyl tRNA synthetase N-terminal domain (ARSNTD), which is a fusion partner for inducing expression of water solubility of protein, expressing ARSNTD-HA fusion protein to be water-soluble, and inducing self-assembly into a triple body. In addition, the present invention relates to development of a preventive vaccine which forms water-soluble capsid by expressing L1 of human papilloma virus (HPV) into ARSNTD-L1 fusion protein and effectively prevents infection from HPV.
column15: SEONG BAIK LIN;;SHIN HANG CHEOL;;YU JI EUN;;YANG SEUNG WON;;JANG YO HAN;;BYUN YOUNG HO;;LEE YOON JAE;;CHAE WON IL

column12: ARSNTD A MANUFACTURING METHOD FOR SOLUBLE AND ACTIVE RECOMBINANT PROTEIN USING Aminoacyl tRNA synthetase N-terminal domain AS FUSION PARTNER AND A PRODUCT THEREOF
column13: The present invention relates to a method for efficiently preparing water-soluble recombinant proteins in Escherichia coli by using a fusion protein expression technology being a protein folding induction technique. More specifically, aminoacyl tRNA synthetase N-terminal domains (ARSNTD), being a fusion partner for the protein-mediated fusion-induction, can be fused with an HA1 part for inducing immune-specificity among hemagglutinin (HA) antigens being influenza antigen proteins, thereby enabling the soluble expression of the ARSNTD-HA fusion proteins and self-assembly of the ARSNTD-HA fusion proteins in a triple helix structure to develop a preventive vaccine effectively preventing infection. The L1 part of Human Papilloma virus (HPV) can also be expressed as ARSNTD-L1 fusion proteins to form water-soluble capsids and effectively prevent HPV infection as a preventive vaccine.
column15: SEONG BAIK LIN;;SHIN HANG CHEOL;;YU JI EUN;;YANG SEUNG WON;;JANG YO HAN;;BYUN YOUNG HO;;LEE YOON JAE;;CHAE WON IL;;PARK YEAN HEE

column12: THE ENVIRONMENT-FRIENDLY BIODEGRADABLE PLANT PROPAGATION MULTI-POT MANUFACTURING METHODS AND THE PRODUCTS USING STARCH AND RICE BYPRODUCTS
column13: PURPOSE: A biodegradable plant propagation multi-pot is provided to have moderate strength for plant propagation, and to improve sterilization ability, deodorant ability and heterogeneity, and to be naturally degradable in soil. CONSTITUTION: An environment-friendly composition for plant propagation comprises 30-60 weight% of rice chaff, 5-15 weight% of rice bran, 5-15 weight% of starch, 5-10 weight% of urea, 1-10 weight% of titanium powder, and 20-30 weight% of water. A manufacturing method thereof comprises: a step of crushing the rice chaff and the rice bran by using a pulverizer; a step of forming a composition for plant propagation by using the crushed rice chaff and the rice bran; a step of mixing the composition for plant propagation for 10-20 minutes; and a step of molding the composition by heating and pressurizing.

column12: BIODEGRADABLE, PHOTODEGRADABLE BIO FILM CONTAINING RICE HULL AND RICE BRAN, AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF
column13: The present invention relates to a biodegradable, photo-degradable biofilm comprising rice hull and rice bran, and a method of its preparation. More particularly, the present presentation relates to a biodegradable, photo-degradable biofilm comprising rice hull and rice bran, starch, titanium dioxide and biodegradable polyester, which enables to retain a suitable strength to protect crops during their growth, thus being capable of reducing the cost normally required for collecting the leftover films used for covering field during cultivation and the handling cost thereof.
